00010 void handle_test_options ( int argc, char* argv[])
00011 {
00012   int c;
00013   char new_sys_dir[512];
00014 
00015   new_sys_dir[0] = '\0';
00016   msglevel = INFO;
00017 
00018   while ((c = getopt (argc, argv, "hm:d:")) != -1)
00019     switch (c)
00020       {
00021       case 'h':
00022         printf ("Usage: runtest [switches]\n");
00023         printf ("\t-h           help, print this message\n");
00024         printf ("\t-m [fewid]   msg level [fatal,error,warn,info,debug]\n");
00025         printf ("\t-d db_dir  default to ./tests/testdb\n");
00026         exit(0);
00027       case 'm':
00028         switch (optarg[0])
00029           {
00030           case 'f': msglevel = FATAL; break;
00031           case 'e': msglevel = ERROR; break;
00032           case 'w': msglevel = WARN; break;
00033           case 'i': msglevel = INFO; break;
00034           case 'd': msglevel = DEBUG; break;
00035           }
00036         break;
00037       case 'd':
00038         strcpy (new_sys_dir, optarg);
00039         break;
00040       case '?':
00041         if (optopt == 'm' || optopt == 'd' || optopt == 'c')
00042           printf ("Option -%c requires an argument.\n", optopt);
00043         else if (isprint (optopt))
00044           printf ("Unknown option `-%c'.\n", optopt);
00045         else
00046           printf ("Unknown option character `\\x%x'.\n", optopt);
00047         abort ();
00048       default:
00049         abort ();
00050       }
00051         
00052   if (new_sys_dir[0] == '\0')
00053     strcpy (new_sys_dir, "./tests/testdb");
00054 
00055   if ( set_system_dir (new_sys_dir) == -1 )
00056     {
00057       put_msg (ERROR, "cannot set system dir at %s\n", new_sys_dir);
00058       exit (EXIT_FAILURE);
00059     }
00060 }
